mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Stores (storeName, storeInfo, storePhoneNumber, storeBrand, storeLocation, storeLatitude, storeLongitude, storeTime, batCount, lefthandStatus, parkingStatus, groupSeatStatus, floorScreenStatus, storageStatus, lessonStatus, reserveStatus, couponStatus) VALUES (#{storeName}, #{storeInfo}, #{storePhoneNumber}, #{storeBrand}, #{storeLocation}, #{storeLatitude}, #{storeLongitude}, #{storeTime}, #{batCount}, #{lefthandStatus}, #{parkingStatus}, #{groupSeatStatus}, #{floorScreenStatus}, #{storageStatus}, #{lessonStatus}, #{reserveStatus}, #{couponStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE Stores SET storeName=#{storeName}, storeInfo=#{storeInfo}, storePhoneNumber=#{storePhoneNumber}, storeLocation=#{storeLocation}, storeLatitude=#{storeLatitude}, storeLongitude=#{storeLongitude}, storeTime=#{storeTime}, batCount=#{batCount}, lefthandStatus=#{lefthandStatus}, parkingStatus=#{parkingStatus}, groupSeatStatus=#{groupSeatStatus}, floorScreenStatus=#{floorScreenStatus}, storageStatus= #{storageStatus}, lessonStatus=#{lessonStatus}, reserveStatus=#{reserveStatus}, couponStatus=#{couponStatus} WHERE storeIdx = #{storeIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Stores s LEFT JOIN StoreBrand b ON s.storebrand = b.brandIdx WHERE storeIdx = #{storeIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Coupons (storeIdx, couponName, couponPercentage, couponDeadline) VALUES (#{storeIdx}, #{couponName}, #{couponPercentage}, #{couponDeadline})
